email_templates.name: basic_outreach
email_templates.content:
{Hi|Hey|Hello},

I hope this email finds you well.

{I wanted to reach out because|I came across your profile and|I thought you might be interested in} {our services|what we're building|this opportunity}.

{Would you be interested in learning more?|Let me know if you'd like to chat|I'd love to tell you more about it}.

Best regards,
{Your Name|The Team}
